entry.title: 0.8.0rc1 status
entry.summary: The author has conducted test builds on FreeBSD using gcc and clang to build both the qt gui and command line daemon. The tests have run clean without any problems reported. The author has made no adjustments apart from applying needed changes to include directory statements. In response to Gavin Andresen's suggestion to pull #2286 before final release or rc2, Pieter Wuille suggests that #2243 should fix the non-determinism problem in Windows. This discussion took place on the Bitcoin-development mailing list.
